name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: A comment left by knuckleheadbabylon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, Overmedicated, Jesler729, dullard, unquotable, Howard, JuanCarlos, atticusonline, Zem, scraggg, wombatroop, nilehus)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, fosters, rowboat, bug, dullard, rad_chillies, unquotable, Howard, JuanCarlos, godfatherofsouls, aHatOfPig, ravindra108, Zem, scraggg, wombatroop, Pigs)

name: saint
text:
Why did I say those words?
Why was I a tool?

name: woodenteeth
text:
I've been going through the archives and I'm beginning to think that, like Lyle, you're conning us. All deliberately saying a lameable thing and then being incredibly self-deprecating, garnering many a chubby (the whole self-deprecation thing being a major past-time of all reading).

Good con!

name: saint
text:
OR, was I a rather sizable tool...and in re-reading my trash, realizing this fact?

OR IS IT BOTH?

name: woodenteeth
text: My mind! She is blown!

name: saint
text: You mean the mind that I... boned?

name: woodenteeth
text: Do you mind?

name: soticoto
text:
... I was the one who chubbied your initial post.
The one .
It was nifty.
Why you goin and callin yourself a tool for it?

name: apricotta
text: In fact, it wouldn't be the first time Todd gets thrown away.

name: poodlelucy
text: good call. although that was a throwing away for the purpose of healing.

name: wharfrat
text: hmm...has anyone else out there found a piss smelling sweatshirt in their hallway, and not been quite sure who was responsible?

name: qwerty
text: A comment left by qwerty was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Deusoma, gethen, Comrade_Tom)

name: sortelli
text: That's romance, right there.

name: xi
text: Good story, good story.

name: spinynorman
text:
Somewhere Jimmy Stewart is applauding

He probably doesn't know why, but I like to think he does

name: toiletstore
text: I chubby this man for showing me the true meaning of love.

name: epicurus
text: I didn't know what to do so I panicked and chubbied this.

name: dusty
text: That explanation works in so many situations.

name: scifigrl47
text: Default chubby to get yourself out of an uncomfortable situation: an Assetbar tradition.

name: terribleman
text: Oh shit, better chubby.

name: soticoto
text: ... tool.

name: agika
text: Aww, so close, Lyle...better luck next time.

name: dans
text: A comment left by dans was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by silver_lake, _cheesekayke, ActualTaunt, atticusonline, wombatroop, obvious)

name: juancarlos
text: The alt-text says Teodor Christmas present is forgiving lyle for shitting on sweatshirt. Five out of Five.

name: samuraieaux
text: How do you see the alt text???

name: deusoma
text: Hover your mouse over the image and let it sit there for a few seconds. Failing that, right click and check the properties.

name: mintyhelminthes
text: oh.  sweet.  I'd been viewing the page source when the alt text was too long for the hover box

name: omegatron
text: There are also browser extensions and scripts for that.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Man, with behavior like that, it's a wonder Lyle gets to live in Onstad's house.

name: hereward
text: This is a good point, Onstad seems to like to run a tight ship. What is the reason? I reckon they have some shady deal going.

name: doomchild
text:
Onstad can't be seen buying Ancient Shenanigan, so Lyle picks it up for him on his runs down to the only bar in Tijuana that sells Gusana Rojo. In return, Onstad rolls Lyle over to prevent him choking on a combination of Mexcal and Johnson's Water Sealant.

DC

name: natemeister
text: i like the appropriation of Roseanne's name for a shit specifically left in a sweatshirt.

name: omegatron
text: I did not notice that.

name: pwb
text:
oh greedy goddamn Todd

will you he ever learn

name: wae
text: It wouldn't be the first time that someone had used the thing as a toilet and left it in the hall. It would be the sixth time.

name: steerpike66
text: Lowest grift ever. Lyle and Todd have been at rock bottom so long that they should move in furniture.

name: steerpike66
text: 'Until Christmas' is a nice, matter-of-fact answer.

name: lobster_mobster
text: The alt text MAKES this one.

name: cab234
text: 5'd for alt text.

name: terebikun
text: Check out panel 1 and then the last panel.  Lyle's shirt is disintegrating.

name: fosters
text: Todd doesn't even have to physically appear in the strip to make it awesome. Just the mention of whatever he's doing at the moment will do. Lyle is a bonus.

name: vincentkv
text: Ahh. Not my first Achewood, but my first after reading the entire archive. I remember how bad it was to have to finally wait a day or two for a new one.

name: eidolem
text:
You know, I used to know a girl--a grown woman, I mean--who had names and personalities and dialogues for all her stuffed animals, brought them with her everywhere and believed--not entirely, but some--that they were alive.

And sometimes I'd get sick of her putting them on the phone with me or telling me about their adventures and I'd imagine sordid lives for them. She did not appreciate it.

Achewood is my catharsis.

name: heccibiggs
text: I am trying to imagine how Lyle and Todd came up with this scam. Whose idea was it that Todd would be accurately represented by a turd? "Yeah, I weigh b-b-bout the same as a shit!"

name: dybrar
text: He just a crappy little bullshit man, the connection basically makes itself.

name: billmiller
text: todd is the best player, even when off screen

name: princelumber
text: ahhh random comic button. Everytime I think life is a meaningless pile, I press you and you make things all better. Thank you for this gem.

name: duperando
text: beautiful alt text
